messages.message:
Hi Nidhi, 2 ways:
1. From inside any of our services: `make activate-cluster-main-prod-gc index_cluster_prod=002`
2. Running the following command: `gcloud container clusters get-credentials instabase-main-prod-002 --zone us-central1-c --project instabase-main` this can be retrieved by visiting the `Kubernetes -> Cluster` page on instabase-main (https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/clusters/details/us-central1-c/instabase-main-prod-002?project=instabase-main&organizationId=396394272939&tab=details&persistent_volumes_tablesize=50&storage_class_tablesize=50&nodes_tablesize=50&node_pool_tablesize=10) project and clicking on the ‘Connect’ button
